mapper.select: SELECT sum(account) FROM ( -- 直投 SELECT br.recover_capital AS account -- 放款金额 FROM ht_borrow_recover br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE b.recover_last_time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) -- 放款时间 AND b.recover_last_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginDate}) AND br.accede_order_id IS NULL UNION ALL -- 汇计划 SELECT sum(a.accede_account) AS account -- 加入金额 FROM ht_hjh_accede a WHERE a.create_time <= #{endDate} -- 加入时间 AND a.create_time >= #{beginDate} UNION ALL -- 债转 SELECT sum(assign_capital) AS account -- 承接本金 FROM ht_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.create_time <= #{endDate} -- 承接时间 AND ct.create_time >= #{beginDate} ) t

SELECT sum(account) FROM ( -- 直投 SELECT count(*) AS account -- 放款笔数 FROM ht_borrow_tender br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE b.recover_last_time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) -- 放款时间 AND b.recover_last_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginDate}) AND br.accede_order_id IS NULL -- 刨除汇计划 UNION ALL -- 汇计划 SELECT count(*) AS account -- 加入笔数 FROM ht_hjh_accede a WHERE a.create_time <= #{endDate} -- 加入时间 AND a.create_time >= #{beginDate} UNION ALL -- 债转 SELECT count(*) AS account -- 承接笔数 FROM ht_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.create_time <= #{endDate} -- 承接时间 AND ct.create_time >= #{beginDate} ) t

SELECT sum(counts) FROM ( SELECT count(1) AS counts FROM ht_borrow_tender br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid where br.status = 1 and br.accede_order_id IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT count(1) AS counts FROM ht_credit_tender
UNION ALL SELECT count(1) AS counts FROM ht_hjh_accede ) tmp

SELECT sum(account) FROM ( -- 直投 SELECT br.recover_capital AS account -- 放款金额 FROM ht_borrow_recover br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE br.accede_order_id is null union ALL -- 汇计划 select sum(a.accede_account) as account -- 加入金额 from ht_hjh_accede a
UNION ALL -- 债转 select sum(assign_capital) AS account -- 承接本金 from ht_credit_tender ct
UNION ALL -- 汇添金 select sum(repay_capital) as account -- 应还本金 from ht_debt_plan_accede
UNION ALL -- 汇添利 SELECT sum(amount) AS account -- 加入金额 FROM ht_product_list WHERE invest_status = 0 -- 投资成功
)t

SELECT sum(account) FROM ( -- 直投 SELECT br.recover_interest_yes AS account -- 已收利息 FROM ht_borrow_recover br WHERE br.accede_order_id IS NULL UNION ALL -- 汇计划 SELECT sum(a.received_interest) AS account -- 已收利息 FROM ht_hjh_accede a UNION ALL -- 汇添金 SELECT sum(repay_interest_yes) AS account -- 已收利息 FROM ht_debt_plan_accede UNION ALL -- 汇添利 SELECT sum(interest) AS account -- 加入金额 FROM ht_product_list WHERE invest_status = 0 -- 投资成功 ) t
SELECT SUM(borrow_full_time - verify_time) / COUNT(*) / 60 FROM ht_borrow WHERE verify_time <= unix_timestamp(#{date})

select SUM(br.recover_capital_wait) FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE br.recover_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date}) and (br.recover_yestime is null or br.recover_yestime >UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date}) )
select count(*) from ht_borrow where create_time <= #{date}
select sum(bank_invest_sum)/count(*) from ht_account where bank_invest_sum>0

select sum(count) from( select sum(already_invest) as count from ht_hjh_accede where create_time <= #{date} union all select sum(accede_account) as count from ht_debt_plan_accede where create_time <= #{date} union all select sum(account) from ht_borrow_tender where create_time <= #{date}) as tmp
